alert.note: Alert for Boone; Cabell; Kanawha; Lincoln; Logan; Putnam; Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 9:09AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Heavy showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cabell, northwestern Kanawha, southern Putnam, Lincoln, northwestern Logan, northeastern Wayne and northwestern Boone Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 906 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ona to near Harts. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Madison, Hamlin, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Milton, Chapmanville, Poca, Ranger, Culloden, Spurlockville, Institute, Tornado, Harts, Cross Lanes and Gill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 29 and 54. Route 119 between mile markers 37 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Cabell; Kanawha; Lincoln; Logan; Putnam; Wayne
